settings.heading: Do Your Most Rewarding Work
settings.description: Join our mission to help people make informed choices for their periods, their bodies, and their lives.

settings.heading: Why JUNE?
settings.description: JUNE is a team of analytical thinkers, problem solvers, and cross examiners powered by the conviction that having a safe and comfy period isn't a luxury, it's an essential. We value a sense of urgency, bold decision-making, and unconventional ideas. We’re a small and passionate team that thinks deeply but moves quickly to develop thoughtful, mission-driven products and experiences.

settings.heading: Help People Live Healthier Lives
settings.description: Rewarding work challenges us to grow every day while serving something bigger than ourselves. Driven by the belief that knowledge is power, health is personal and community is key, JUNE is on a mission to give people the information and products they need to make smarter choices for their bodies so they can confidently live their healthiest lives.

settings.heading: Period Care’s Next Frontier
settings.description: So far, we've helped over 300,000 menstruators make the switch to smarter period products—which means we still have a long way to go. Over time, we’ve expanded the Original June Cup to include the June Mini, aftercare essentials, and period underwear. When it comes to innovating safer and more comfortable menstrual care options, we’re just getting started.

settings.heading: SHIPPING DETAILS
settings.sub_heading: We ship all orders USPS. Orders ship within 24-48 hours (excluding weekends & holidays). Typical transit times are 3-5 days depending on your location. We currently do NOT ship internationally but send us an email and we'll get you on an early access list for international customers.
